attributes.action: debate  the misuse of  drugs act
attributes.additional_details: Call for a full parliamentary debate on the control, regulation, availability and quality of tobacco alcohol and  all substances that are currently  prohibited  but continue to be  in use every day in this country we want parliament to force the government to accept a scientific based approach to harm reduction of all  drugs and to look at how to properly apply the drugs act so that harm reduction is the top priority also for parliament to investigate the costs and success of the policys that our government follow at present and if they could be improved
